snippet: Liverpool are now off the Premier League roller coaster and looking in the right direction according to manager Juergen Klopp, who saw his side dismantle top-four rivals Arsenal in a scintillating 3-1 win on Saturday....

headline.main: Accam Helps Fire Earn 1-1 Draw With Crew in Opener
headline.print_headline: Accam Helps Fire Earn 1-1 Draw With Crew in Opener

lead_paragraph: Liverpool are now off the Premier League roller coaster and looking in the right direction according to manager Juergen Klopp, who saw his side dismantle top-four rivals Arsenal in a scintillating 3-1 win on Saturday.
